descriptionHtml:
Did you want to fight the Civil War battles anytime for fun as a survival mod. Now you can! This mod will add a spell to the player and when you cast it you can choose to be a Stormcloaks or Imperial and choose your Armor and then choose where to fight. Some battles are...

[url=http://uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Fort_Amol]Fort Amol[/url]
[url=http://uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Fort_Dunstad]Fort Dunstad[/url]
[url=http://uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Fort_Greenwall]Fort Greenwall[/url]
[url=http://uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Fort_Hraggstad]Fort Hraggstad[/url]
[url=http://uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Fort_Kastav]Fort Kastav[/url]
[url=http://uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Fort_Neugrad]Fort Neugrad[/url]
[url=http://uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Fort_Snowhawk]Fort Snowhawk[/url]
[url=http://uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Fort_Sungard]Fort Sungard[/url]
Solitude
Windhelm
Whiterun

When you start the battle all of the items in your inventory will be removed except for the armor and weapons given to you in the battle. When one if the enemy soldiers die you will receive gold and this gold can be used to buy arrows and potions. The arrows can be bought from the archery hay target and the potions can be bought from the brewer. The archery target and brewer will move every hour to a random spot and you can use the quest markers to find it. The more hours that go by the harder it gets. Once you die a message will appear letting you know how many hours you survived. Once you cast the spell to start the Battle do not overwrite your saved game since you cannot leave or stop the battle. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/13242/?]here[/url].Â And if you play Oblivion also look at my [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/30089/?]Oblivion Kvatch Battle[/url] mod.

Requirements
Skyrim
Dawnguard (Dawnguard Crossbows)

To install just download then extract folder and drag the master, bsa and plugin files into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
